message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and the potential it holds, I propose a starting price of $750,000. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am looking for a more reasonable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept $650,000 for the product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $700,000. This reflects the value we believe the product holds for your business. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you wish to continue negotiating.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am still seeking a more favorable price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $675,000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial price. In light of this, I am proposing a counteroffer of $690,000. This still reflects the value we place on the product, while being more accommodating to your financial considerations. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you, and please let me know if you require further discussion.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I am still seeking a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $685,000.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. I understand your position and would like to extend a counteroffer of $695,000. This price reflects a compromise that maintains the value of the product while addressing some of your financial concerns. I hope this proposal will be more agreeable to you. Please let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $690,000.

Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Bob. I am pleased to extend a final counteroffer of $692,500. This price aims to provide a fair compromise between the value of the product and your financial constraints. I hope this will be a satisfactory solution for both parties. Please let me know if you are able to accept this proposal.
Thank you for your final counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $690,000.
